ARABIC: إِنَّ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ فِى عَذَابِ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: The evildoers will remain timelessly, for ever, in the punishment of Hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The sinners will certainly dwell for ever in the torment of Hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: But the evil-doers shall abide in the torment of Hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The criminals will live forever in the torment of hell. Their torment will not be relieved and they will despair of escaping.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed the criminals will stay in the punishment of hell forever.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, the criminals will be in the torment of Hell to abide therein forever.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely the guilty shall abide in the chastisement of hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: But the evildoers dwell forever in the chastisement of Gehenna
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! the guilty are immortal in hell's torment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: As for the evil-doers, they shall endure forever the torment of Hell,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily the culprits in Hell's torment will be abiders.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed the guilty will remain [forever] in the punishment of hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: The sinners will be in the Punishment of Hell, to dwell therein (for aye):
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, the Mujrimun (criminals, sinners, disbelievers, etc.) will be in the torment of Hell to abide therein forever.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: But the evildoers shall live for ever in the punishment of Gehenna (Hell),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: As for the sinners, they will be in the torment of Hell forever.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, the criminals will be in the punishment of Hell, abiding eternally.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [43:74] Indeed the guilty will abide [forever] in the chastisement of Hell —
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: 572 Lo! the guilty) the idolaters: Abu Jahl and his host (are immortal in hell's torment) neither to die or leave it.
